document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the Midnight Sun on Curtain Alley.
document_data.name: The Midnight Sun
document_data.mainbody: The ''' Midnight Sun''' was a tavern located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The tavern lay at the end of a smaller western branch of [[Curtain Alley]] within a section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] that lay in between the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] and the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]]. The locals called this branch the [[Tween Run]].
